text: the first time I saw the Empire State
Building and I was about 12 years old I
loved the Empire State Building very
much because of a very detailed and a
nice beautiful structures and windows
Stephen Wiltshire was diagnosed with
autism at the age of 3 and he was mute
until the age of five he went to a
special school for Queens no school in
Fulham London and there they discovered
that Stephen had this unique ability of
reproduce in cities and buses and cars
very lifelike to what we see today
I have no idea how he's able to do this
but he enjoys doing it it's helped to
form a relationship that he has between
pen and paper and also an understanding
of the cities that we live in one of his
mottos is that you know do the best you
can and never stop regardless so I think
it's a great lesson for us all
[Music]
